strings.schematron.title: DCAT-AP - Mandatory
strings.required.language.title: Language of a CatalogRecord.
strings.required.language.assert: The CatalogRecord does not define a language.
strings.required.language.report: The CatalogRecord has at least one dct:language.
strings.required.catalogtitle.title: Title of a Catalog.
strings.required.catalogtitle.assert: The Catalog does not have a title.
strings.required.catalogtitle.report: The Catalog has at least one dct:title.
strings.required.dataservicetitle.count.title: A DataService always has at least one title.
strings.required.dataservicetitle.uniquelang.tit: A DataService has at most one title per language.
strings.required.dataservicetitle.uniquelang.ass: Multiple titles found for the same language.
strings.required.dataservicetitle.validstring.ti: A DataService title must contain text.
strings.required.dataserviceendpointURL.validstr: The endpointURL of a DataService must contain an IRI.
The provided endpointURL is not a valid IRI.
The endpointURL is a valid IRI.
